Mr Michael Gove said: This Government backs teachers. All the evidence from those countries with great education systems tells us that nothing is more important than attracting great people into teaching and supporting them in the classroom. "Teachers will be free to impose the penalties they need to keep order and free from the red tape which swallows up teaching time, so they can get on with their first duty- raising standards. Plans to axe a number of education quangos will feature in the Bill, as will the legislation required to allow the Government to charge university students higher rates of interest on tuition fee loans.
